project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions, tracks the user's score, and displays it at the end.

task.name: Implement logic to display questions and capture user input
Calculate the score based on user responses
Display the final score to the user after all questions are answered
Write tests to verify that questions, scoring, and input logic function as expected
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
